Major_Arcs.title: Ghost Town Mystery and Modern Disruption
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the setting, main characters, and the central conflict concerning the legendary Ghost Town and the modern plans to build an airport over it.

sub_scenes.title: Saloon Refusal and Ghost Town Introduction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the stage in the old West, introduces a key character, and contrasts it with the emerging conflict related to Ghost Town.

sub_scenes.title: Flashback and Modern Day Airport Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene transitions between past and present, highlighting personal connections to Ghost Town and the impending threat of its destruction by modern development.

narrative_arcs.title: Modern Day Disruption: Airport Plans for Ghost Town
Encounter with Construction Workers and Disdain

Major_Arcs.title: Family Drama and Business Pressures
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to family dynamics, business negotiations, and personal conflicts within the ranch setting, particularly concerning Nan and her father.

sub_scenes.title: Airport Business and Father-Daughter Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the business aspects of the airport plan and introduces conflict between Nan and her father regarding her role and opinions.

sub_scenes.title: Conflicting Comforts and Decisive Action
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene explores Nan's emotional turmoil and her attempts to seek clarity and resolution in her relationship with Cal amidst family and societal expectations.

narrative_arcs.title: Horses to the Airport and the Deal

Major_Arcs.title: The Great Blizzard and Community Crisis
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts the narrative to a severe weather crisis, focusing on the community's response, fears for their livestock, and the eventual relief.

sub_scenes.title: Weather's Impact and Community Concern
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the onset of a severe blizzard and its immediate impact on the characters and their community, highlighting the growing crisis.

narrative_arcs.title: Recollections of Changed Weather and Difficult Journey
Seeking Comfort and Reassurance Amidst Hardship
Recalling Past Winter's Severity and Impending Starvation
Riding Out to Face the Crisis and Uncertain Future

sub_scenes.title: Despair, Hope, and Relief
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene captures the emotional rollercoaster of dealing with the blizzard, from anxiety and despair to the unexpected arrival of hope and relief for the community.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflection on Restlessness and Persistent Snowfall
The Sound of Hope: Arrival of a Plane
Relief from the Sky and Reflections on Romance

Major_Arcs.title: Cowtown Casanova and Jeff's Obsession
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new storyline centered around Chane Benson, his violent reputation, and Jeff's fascination with him, leading to tension and confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Chane Benson and Jeff's Hero Worship
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Chane Benson and his actions in Cowtown, setting up his character and the initial reactions from onlookers and Jeff.

narrative_arcs.title: Advice on Decency and Confrontation with Benson

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Worries and Clyde's Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Sally's deep concerns about Jeff's fascination with Benson and her attempts to seek help and reassurance regarding Jeff's behavior.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern Over Jeff's Gun Obsession and Control
Reassurance and Premonition of Finding Jeff
Clyde's Retrospective Account of Jeff's Disappearance
Introducing Mr. Benson and Casual Banter
Mr. Benson's Ominous Tone Shift and Mention of Death

Major_Arcs.title: Benson's Threat and Newspaper Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the escalating conflict between the newspaper and Benson, driven by articles and personal confrontations, leading to a tense showdown.

sub_scenes.title: Benson's Justification and Article Controversy
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Benson's perspective and the controversy surrounding Clyde's articles about him, setting up the conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Clyde's Justification for Writing About Benson
Sally's Distrust and Ominous Description of Benson
Benson's Threat to Clean Up Juniper Town

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Threats and Dinner Invitation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the direct confrontation and escalating threats, contrasted with Sally's strategic decision to invite Chane Benson to dinner.

narrative_arcs.title: Flashback to Benson's Articles and Consequences
Considering Inviting Chane Benson for Dinner
Sally's Persuasion and Jeff's Agreement to Invite Chane
Invitation to Dinner and Observation of Chane's Demeanor
Discussion on Chane's Artistic Skills and Character

Major_Arcs.title: Dinner Deception and Violent Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the dinner with Chane Benson, escalating tensions, misunderstandings, and ultimately leading to a violent physical confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Dinner Conversation and Rising Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene captures the initial polite facade of the dinner, which quickly unravels into suspicion and accusation between Sally and Chane.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane's Confrontation and Accusation of Trap
Sally's Accusation and Demand for Honesty
Sally's Angry Explanation to Jeff about Chane's Actions and Intentions

sub_scenes.title: Physical Fight and Newspaper Showdown
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the violent physical confrontation between Jeff and Chane, and the subsequent resolution at the newspaper office.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane's Angry Confrontation and Jeff's Punch
Sally's Desperate Plea and Jeff's Fall
Urgent Warning and Chase After Chane

Major_Arcs.title: New Ranch Storyline: Betsy and Steve
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new setting and characters at a ranch, focusing on Betsy, Steve Daley, and the brewing range war, shifting away from the previous storyline.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Introduction and Impending Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the new ranch setting, characters, and hints at an impending conflict and the arrival of Steve Daley.

narrative_arcs.title: Confirmation and Approbation of Steve Daley's Hiring
Offer of Accommodation and Lingering Doubts

sub_scenes.title: Journey to Town and Growing Romance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene moves the action to town, showing Betsy and Steve's journey and the development of their relationship amidst the ranch conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Journey into Town and Expressed Gratitude
Hank's Orders and Material for a Dress

sub_scenes.title: Hiring a Gunslinger and Romantic Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves the immediate town conflict, leading to Betsy's decision to hire Steve as a bodyguard and the blossoming romance between them.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Firm Decision to Hire a Gunslinger
Justification and Acceptance from Authority Figure
Hank's Concern and Betsy's Softened Stance
Sudden Intense Feelings and Mutual Confession

sub_scenes.title: Range War Escalation and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene escalates the range war conflict, culminating in a confrontation and resolution driven by Betsy and Steve.

narrative_arcs.title: Old Man Bridges' Arrival and Ranch Hands' Confrontation
Betsy's Warning and Steve's Determination Amidst Threats
Betsy's Assertion of Authority on Gun Use
Aftermath: Horse Theft and Realization of Loss
Ride to Devil's Pass and Arrival at Gunfire Scene
Arrival at Devil's Pass and Confrontation

Major_Arcs.title: New Ranch Storyline: Carrie, Dave, and Fred
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces yet another new storyline with different characters on a new ranch, focusing on romantic entanglements, business deals, and conflicts arising from love and duty.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Daughter's Romantic Conflict and Business Concerns
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the new ranch storyline, introducing characters and initial conflicts related to romance and ranch management.

narrative_arcs.title: Ranch Concerns about Curley and Outsiders

sub_scenes.title: Apologies, Guilt, and Relationship Boundaries
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene explores the aftermath of the confrontation, focusing on apologies, guilt, and the complex relationships between Carrie, Dave, and Fred.

sub_scenes.title: Business and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces business conflicts, betrayal, and the importance of the Carlton contract in the romantic and business relationships.

narrative_arcs.title: Assertion of Independence and Business Acumen

sub_scenes.title: Carrie's Final Choice and Dave's Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Carrie's ultimate romantic decision and its impact on her relationship with Dave, leading to his departure and her confession of love for Fred.

narrative_arcs.title: Father's Intuition and Long Ride Reflection

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Climax and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes Carrie's romantic storyline with a confession of love and a marriage proposal, resolving the romantic tension.

narrative_arcs.title: Revelation of Fred's Arrival and Misunderstanding
Carlton's Explanation of the Beef Contract
Realization of Foolishness and Seeking Reassurance
Affectionate Embrace and Plea for Kiss

Major_Arcs.title: New Mystery: Dirk and the Marshal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new mystery involving Dirk, his injury, and a pursuing Marshal, shifting the narrative to a chase and confrontation storyline.

sub_scenes.title: Urgent Entry and Dirk's Injury Reveal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dirk's urgent situation, his injury, and the initial mystery surrounding his actions and identity.

narrative_arcs.title: Revelation of Dirk's Injury and Medical Examination

sub_scenes.title: Grandfather's Investigation and Marshal's Ranch Visit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene expands the mystery by showing the grandfather's concern and the arrival of the Marshal at the ranch, increasing tension and introducing new perspectives.

narrative_arcs.title: Ranch Confrontation and Demand for Authority

sub_scenes.title: Accusation, Defense, and Truce
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene clarifies the accusation against Dirk and explores the conflict between law and justice, leading to a temporary truce due to Dirk's injury.

narrative_arcs.title: Law vs. Justice and Dirk's Injury

Major_Arcs.title: Love Triangle and Chase
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the romantic love triangle between the Ranch Owner, Chris, and Rance, intertwined with the chase and confrontation between Dirk and the Marshal.

sub_scenes.title: Confession, Conflict, and Escape Plan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the romantic feelings and jealousy among the characters, leading to an escape plan for Dirk and Chris.

narrative_arcs.title: Plea for Understanding and Escape Plan

sub_scenes.title: Departure, Return, and Reconciliation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the aftermath of the chase and gunfight, focusing on the characters' choices, departures, returns, and reconciliation.

narrative_arcs.title: Leaving the Wounded Marshal and Woman's Reflection
Dirk's Farewell and Escape to Mexico
Chris's Return to Rance and Woman's Thoughts
Rance's Pursuit and Dirk's Escape Confirmed

sub_scenes.title: Recovery, Forgiveness, and Wedding
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Dirk/Marshal storyline, focusing on Rance's recovery, forgiveness, and the final romantic resolution with the wedding.

narrative_arcs.title: Clearing Chris's Name and Woman's Forgiveness
Confession of Love and Lingering Fear
Confrontation and Clarification at the Wedding
